text:
Agra is a city in Phillips County, Kansas, United States. In 2010, 267 people lived there.
History.
Agra was first settled in 1888. It was incorporated in 1904. Agra was a station on the Chicago, Rock Island and Pacific Railroad. It was named after Agra in India.
Geography.
Agra is at (39.760686, -99.119592). The United States Census Bureau says that the city has a total area of. All of it is land.
2010 census.
The 2010 census says that there were 267 people, 116 households, and 78 families living in Agra.
